channel.title: LA Lakers on TechnoStreet

item.title: Is Anthony Davis Playing Tonight vs Blazers? Lakers Issue Availability Report as They Prepare to Take on Nikola Jokic and Co
item.description: Is Anthony Davis Playing Tonight vs Blazers? Lakers Issue Availability Report as They Prepare to Take on Nikola Jokic and Co Lakers will take on The Joker’s Nuggets to avoid their 4th straight defeat, and Anthony Davis, if playing, must lead the team on both offense and defense Most types of trouble the Los Angeles Lakers went through last season, await them this season as well.

item.title: “Anthony Davis Was a Top-Seven Player, I Take it Back”: Stephen A. Smith Throws Light on The Brow Amid All Attention on Russell Westbrook
item.description: “Anthony Davis Was a Top-Seven Player, I Take it Back”: Stephen A.

item.title: Once Termed ‘Tragic’, Magic Johnson Offers ‘Accountability’ Advice to Russell Westbrook Post Lakers 0-3 Start
item.description: Once Termed ‘Tragic’, Magic Johnson Offers ‘Accountability’ Advice to Russell Westbrook Post Lakers 0-3 Start Lakers legend Magic Johnson imparts advice to Russell Westbrook while citing his example of being called Tragic Johnson.
